You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &bopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Bopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D539.
  * `&bopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D553.
